## Description
The **Digital archiving hotspot&nbsp;**resource allows to use a legacy Digital Archiving documents archive in a batch or on-demand workflow.

> Important

This is a legacy resource created to support the migration to Digital Archiving 3 build 3.37 (January 2023 release). For all new applications, see: [Digital Archiving Store Resource Reference](/doxee-platform/docs/digital-archiving-store-resource-reference).

## Additional creation parameters
None.

## Resource editor
None.

## Deploy parameters
![](data:image/png;base64,)

Section

Field

Description

**Configuration**

**Tenant**

Select the&nbsp;**Tenant **on which you want to deploy the resource from the drop-down menu.

**Authorization**

**Tag&nbsp;**

Enter the authorization tag identifying the Digital Archiving Store to use.

> Tip

Click **Publish** to publish the release on the tenant.

Click **Deploy** to publish and enable the release on the tenant.
